attributes.action: Ban Police using Horses to control Protests and Riots
attributes.additional_details: The only way we can be sure that horses are not injured during protests and riots is to exclude them from current and future Police Methods of riot control.
attributes.background: Police in the UK often use Horses to control riots and protests. This means that Horses are often subjected to very frightening scenes, and they are often wrongfully targeted by the public. The several cases of injured horses, pedestrians and police officers call for an end to the usage of horses.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of horses in the police force: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325179

Ban the use of horses for crowd control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325275
